Returns: The most specific Organizational Unit (OU) component of this name

SslCertificate.DName(java.lang.String).Description: Creates a new DName from a string. The attributes are assumed to come in most significant to least significant order which is true of human readable values returned by methods such as X500Principal.getName(). Be aware that the underlying sources of distinguished names such as instances of X509Certificate are encoded in least significant to most significant order, so make sure the value passed here has the expected ordering of attributes.

Returns: The most specific Common-name (CN) component of this name
The most specific Organization (O) component of this name
The distinguished name (normally includes CN, O, and OU names)

ClassDesc: A distinguished name helper class: a 3-tuple of: the most specific common name (CN) the most specific organization (O) the most specific organizational unit (OU)
